title: Server got DDOS'd when we were in a ranked 5's game and caused us to lose
body: The server got DDOS'd and we where in the middle of a team fight which we would have won easy and pushed for 2 inhibs, but we all got attempting to reconnect. this caused us to lose the game and be put into bronze 2

replies.body: I doubt it was the sole cause of you being put into bronze do as that is simply not how your MMR works. Unfortunately the servers did have a hiccup last night but it was only for a few seconds.
